name: FilmeyGame
0:
”Alexa, Start Filmy Game”
”Alexa, Open Filmy Game”
”Alexa, Launch Filmy Game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: filmy game
des:
Filmey Game is a skill, designed for all the Bollywood Lovers.
Game is comprised of 5 questions, each question has Three Hints. Using these Hints, guess the Correct Movie Name.
A Correct Answer will grant you 10 points, and a Wrong Answer will give you 0 points.

KEY FEATURES :
- Welcome Speech by Robert, Anjali and Bobby.
- Each Wrong Answer is followed by a Bollywood dialogue.
- For Every Correct Answer, you will be cheered by the Crowd.
- If all 5 Questions are Correct, you will hear a Mogambo Speech.
- Get ready to face Gabbar Singh, if you answered any question incorrect.

NOTE : 
New Questions will be added after every 2 Weeks.

GETTING STARTED : 
Just say "Alexa, Start Filmey Game" to get started!

FEEDBACK :
Any Queries or Feedback are most Welcome.
Just drop a mail at : voiceassistantreviewer@gmail.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
